summary: An updated version of tktk's Pretty Face which fits seamless with Fair Skin Complexion (incl. FSC compatible body textures) and has several improvements.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ffe599]Description[/color]

This is an overhaul of tktk1's [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url] mod which has been updated to fit seamlessly with Fair Skin Complexion and any other body texture mods that are similar with FSC. It also features various improvements made in the texture details and provides normal maps for all other races (incl. ygNord race).
[/font][font=Trebuchet MS]
﻿[b][color=#ffe599][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color][/b]

[list]
[*]Enhanced Character Edit (﻿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951[/url]﻿) or RaceMenu ([url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624[/url]﻿).
[/list]
[/font][font=Trebuchet MS][b][color=#ffe599][size=4]Recommended Mods
[/size][/color][/b]
[/font][list]
[*]The Eyes Of Beauty: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722[/url]﻿﻿
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]Sala Hair: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85848]www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85848[/url]﻿﻿[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]KS Hairdos - HDT Physics: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363]www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363[/url]﻿﻿[/font]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS]
[/font][font=Trebuchet MS][b][b][color=#ffe599][size=4]Credits & Thanks[/size][/color]
[/b][/b]
[list]
[*]tktk1: Original Pretty Face mod
[/list][color=#ffe599][size=4]History[/size][/color]

v1.2.0
[list]
[*]Added optional face & body sweat maps.
[*]Added new optional eye textures.
[*]Fixed Duella template lip color not changeable.
[*]Improved Nebow template for RaceMenu.
[*]Added RaceMenu Nord & Imperial preset templates.
[*]Installer restructuring.
[/list]
v1.1.0
[list]
[*]Enhanced face texture maps for sharper details.
[*]Added optional face diffuse map with less smooth skin.
[*]Added optional eye glitter specular map.
[*]Renewed makeup tint masks for better quality.
[*]All race normal maps have now a slightly distinctive nose and/or other details.
[*]Renewed the scatter map.
[*]Added new warpaint and dirt tint masks.
[*]Added FOMOD installer.
[*]Added body textures.
[/list]
v1.0.0
[list]
[*]First release.
[/list]
[color=#ffe599][size=4][b]My Other Mods

[/b][/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]Ultrawidescreen Fixes for Skyrim LE: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90214]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90214[/url]﻿﻿[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]Whiterun Hold Forest Compability Patches: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89402]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89402[/url]﻿[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]Alternate Start ECE Position Tweak: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89404]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89404[/url]﻿[/font]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS]The Ravens Breeze Home Tweaks: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89405]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89405[/url]﻿[/font]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS]
[color=#ffe599][size=4][b]Skyrim Modding & Optimization Guide 2018[/b][/size][/color]

This is a work in progress! Mainly intended for sharing modding best practices with some friends but it already contains a lot of information for setting up an optimal Skyrim LE base:

[url=https://github.com/ciathyza/skyrim-optimization-guide-2018]https://github.com/ciathyza/skyrim-optimization-guide-2018[/url]﻿
[/font]
author: ciathyza
